code:
import sys

# This program strips a given string of any whitespace characters.

# Get the string from the command line argument
string = sys.argv[1]

# Create a new string which will hold the stripped string
newString = ""

# Iterate through the given string
for character in string:
    # Check if the character is not whitespace
    if character != " ":
        # If it is not whitespace, add it to the new string
        newString += character

# Print the stripped string
print(newString)
